about.summary: An integrated set of tools to analyze and simulate networks based on exponential-family random graph models (ERGMs). 'ergm' is a part of the Statnet suite of packages for network analysis.

name: r-ergm
raw_recipe:
{% set version = '3.9.4' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ergm
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ergm_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ergm/ergm_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 548d783b8f752984436b8ebf7fd828e1afb3d3e6642bcdd2d4209a6b8c82bd2e

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}        # [not win]
    - {{native}}toolchain        # [win]
    - {{posix}}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{posix}}make
    - {{posix}}sed               # [win]
    - {{posix}}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{posix}}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-matrix
    - r-coda >=0.18_1
    - r-dplyr >=0.7.4
    - r-lpsolve
    - r-network >=1.13
    - r-purrr >=0.2.4
    - r-rlang >=0.2.0
    - r-robustbase >=0.9_10
    - r-statnet.common >=4.1.0
    - r-tibble >=1.4.2
    - r-trust
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{native}}gcc-libs         # [win]
    - r-mass
    - r-matrix
    - r-coda >=0.18_1
    - r-dplyr >=0.7.4
    - r-lpsolve
    - r-network >=1.13
    - r-purrr >=0.2.4
    - r-rlang >=0.2.0
    - r-robustbase >=0.9_10
    - r-statnet.common >=4.1.0
    - r-tibble >=1.4.2
    - r-trust

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ergm')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ergm')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://statnet.org
  license: GPL-3
  summary: An integrated set of tools to analyze and simulate networks based on exponential-family
    random graph models (ERGMs). 'ergm' is a part of the Statnet suite of packages for
    network analysis.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - stevierene82

# Package: ergm
# Version: 3.9.4
# Date: 2018-08-15
# Title: Fit, Simulate and Diagnose Exponential-Family Models for Networks
# Authors@R: c( person("Mark S.", "Handcock", role=c("aut"), email="handcock@stat.ucla.edu"), person("David R.", "Hunter", role=c("aut"), email="dhunter@stat.psu.edu"), person("Carter T.", "Butts", role=c("aut"), email="buttsc@uci.edu"), person("Steven M.", "Goodreau", role=c("aut"), email="goodreau@u.washington.edu"), person("Pavel N.", "Krivitsky", role=c("aut","cre"), email="pavel@uow.edu.au", comment=c(ORCID="0000-0002-9101-3362")), person("Martina", "Morris", role=c("aut"), email="morrism@u.washington.edu"), person("Li","Wang",role=c("ctb"),email="lxwang@gmail.com"), person("Kirk","Li",role=c("ctb"),email="kirkli@uw.edu"), person("Skye", "Bender-deMoll", role=c("ctb"), email="skyebend@uw.edu"))

# Packaged: 2018-08-15 04:55:41 UTC; pavel
# Author: Mark S. Handcock [aut], David R. Hunter [aut], Carter T. Butts [aut], Steven M. Goodreau [aut], Pavel N. Krivitsky [aut, cre] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0002-9101-3362>), Martina Morris [aut], Li Wang [ctb], Kirk Li [ctb], Skye Bender-deMoll [ctb]

about.summary: An integrated set of tools to analyze and simulate networks based on exponential-family random graph models (ERGMs). 'ergm' is a part of the Statnet suite of packages for network analysis.
